name: Bridged Mayhem "Text Based TF2"
description:
Bridged Mayhem is a Text Based Simulation of a game of TF2, On the map ctf_2fort.

It has procedural dialog, classes, interactions, navigation and more.
All the things you would need in a Text Based game.

The idea was originally from the Youtuber  "Samwiz1",
And I made it into a game..

If you decide to play this, Make sure to read the Help TXT file in the game's files,
And... I wish you luck :)You'll need it
